verses.verse: Great <WH1419> is Yahweh, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised, <WH1984> in the city <WH5892> of our God, <WH430> in his holy <WH6944> mountain. <WH2022>

Beautiful <WH3303> in elevation, <WH5131> the joy <WH4885> of the whole earth, <WH776> is Mount <WH2022> Zion, <WH6726> on the north <WH6828> sides, <WH3411> the city <WH7151> of the great <WH7227> King. <WH4428>
God <WH430> has shown <WH3045> himself in her citadels <WH759> as a refuge. <WH4869>
For, <WH4428> behold, the kings assembled <WH3259> themselves, <WH5674> they passed by together. <WH3162>
They saw <WH7200> it, <WH8539> then they were amazed. They were dismayed. <WH926> They hurried away. <WH2648>
Trembling <WH7461> took hold <WH270> of them there, <WH2427> pain, as of a woman in travail. <WH3205>
With the east <WH6921> wind, <WH7307> you break <WH7665> the ships <WH591> of Tarshish. <WH8659>

As we have heard, <WH8085> so we have seen, <WH7200> in the city <WH5892> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> in the city <WH5892> of our God. <WH430> God <WH430> will establish <WH3559> it forever. <WH5769> <WH5704> Selah. <WH5542>
We have thought <WH1819> about your loving kindness, <WH2617> God, <WH430> in the midst <WH7130> of your temple. <WH1964>
As is your name, <WH8034> God, <WH430> so is your praise <WH8416> to the ends <WH7099> of the earth. <WH776> Your right hand <WH3225> is full <WH4390> of righteousness. <WH6664>
Let Mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> be glad! <WH1523> Let the daughters <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063> rejoice, <WH1523> Because of your judgments. <WH4941>
Walk about <WH5437> Zion, <WH6726> and go around <WH5362> her. <WH5608> Number its towers. <WH4026>
Mark <WH7896> well <WH3820> her bulwarks. <WH2430> Consider <WH6448> her palaces, <WH759> that you may tell <WH5608> it to the next <WH314> generation. <WH1755>
For this God <WH430> is our God <WH430> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5769> He will be our guide <WH5090> even to death. <WH4192>
